creator: jax@well.com
text:
The new (2004-09-24) -nouserlib switch inserted into build.sh does not allow Ant
to bootstrap itself from build.sh if you don't already have a -nouserlib Ant
built. Workaround: remove the -nouserlib switch for first build after updating tree.

creator: peterreilly@apache.org
text:
When making ant from cvs, you need to do
rm -rf bootstrap; rm -rf build
when ant changes, which is quite often, otherwise
you run into these sort of issues.
